```{r}
library(MLmetrics)
source('model.R')


df <- read.csv('../data/interim/train_clean.csv')
```


```{r}
nb_df <- create_train_test_split(df)

nb_train <- nb_df$train
nb_test <- nb_df$test
```


```{r}
test_model <- model_rf(nb_train)
```


```{r}
pred <- predict_rf(nb_test, test_model)


head(pred)
```

```{r}
a <- MSE(pred, nb_test[,13])

a
```
